alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:29PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mississippi, south central Pemiscot and north central Lauderdale Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dell, or near Gosnell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Gosnell, Dell, Burdette, Little River, Barr, Dearman, Barfield, O`Donnell Bend, Tomato, Hightower, Tuckertown, Burton, Lowden, Hickman, Roseland, Lens Ford, Wilson Junction, Stark City and Number Nine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
